definition: easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes
rampart/base (in baseball)/to build with stones, bricks etc

sentences.english: But lowering trade barriers can help compete away monopoly profits.
sentences.chinese: 而降低貿易壁壘有助於通過競爭減少壟斷利潤。

sentences.english: In the end, everyone loses if there are trade barriers.
sentences.chinese: 如果出現貿易壁壘，最終所有人都會受損。

sentences.english: And if one country imposes his own PPMs on another, the trade barrier will emerge.
sentences.chinese: 把本國標準強加於別國就會產生貿易壁壘。

sentences.english: The pot-sweetener is the elimination ofinternational trade barriers.
sentences.chinese: 這一賭注就是消除國際貿易壁壘。

sentences.english: Article 2 Ministry of Commerce is responsible for the investigation on foreign trade barrier.
sentences.chinese: 第二條商務部負責對國外貿易壁壘的調查工作。

sentences.english: Li said such a trade barrier would be a "disaster".
sentences.chinese: 李高稱這樣的貿易壁壘將是一場“災難”。

sentences.english: It will be a hard slog to sweep away all trade barriers across the Pacific.
sentences.chinese: 在太平洋地區掃除所有的貿易壁壘是一項艱鉅的任務。

pinyin: mao4 yi4 bao3 hu4 zhu3 yi4

definition: (idiom) to use methods appropriate to the current situation
